results.content: Halfway through, and I can truly say that here's a lot of depth in the material, but he makes it understandable.  I work along with him, testing things out on my own sheets, even when he doesn't tell me to do so. He also gives good print documentation which helps me go back and find things that I've forgotten. I am excited to see whether I can truly create a website with which I will be happy. If not, I believe that I will at least have enough understanding to change up other open source sheets of HTML and CSS for use in my own website. :)

results.content: Great course, great instructor.  It's a shame that there are less than 1000 students in this course.
